Venue & Travel

Alliance Manchester Business School, Manchester

The University of Manchester, Booth Street West, Manchester M15 6PB, United Kingdom

Getting Here

  • By Air: Manchester Airport (MAN) is one of the UKâ€™s busiest.
    • Train: Direct to Manchester Piccadilly (15-20 min).
    • Taxi: 20-30 min to city centre.
  • By Train: Piccadilly, Victoria, and Oxford Road are primary stations. Oxford Road is a 15 min walk to AMBS.
  • By Car: Accessible via M6, M60, M62. Parking at Booth Street West.

Local Transport

  • Bus: Most routes serve Oxford Road. Nearest stop: University Shopping Centre.
  • Tram: Nearest stop St Peter's Square (22 min walk).
  • Cycling: Dedicated lanes on Oxford Road.

Accommodation

5 Star

  • The Edwardian Manchester (1 mile)
  • Hotel Gotham (1.2 miles)

4 Star

  • Hyatt Regency Manchester (1-min walk) - Recommended
  • Crowne Plaza Manchester (1.6 miles)

3 Star

  • Holiday Inn Express Oxford Road (0.6 miles)
  • Premier Inn Princess Street (0.5 miles)

Local Attractions

Manchester is vibrant and historic. Don't miss:

  • Manchester Museum (On Campus)
  • Whitworth Art Gallery (0.6 miles)
  • John Rylands Library (1.2 miles)
  • The Northern Quarter - Creative hub
